Package com.example.inventorypro

package com.example.inventorypro
  • Class
    Description
    AddItem
    AddItem Activity is responsible for gathering user input and re-creating the MainActivity with the parsed Item.
    CreateTagsFragment
    This DialogFragment is the screen used to define/create/edit tags.
    DatabaseManager
    Responsible for communication with Firestore as well as invoking updates to the application in relation to this data.
    FilterFragment
    Fragment which updates the UserPreferences FilterSettings.
    FilterSettings
    The FilterSettings contain all of the settings data required to perform filtering on the item list.
    Helpers
    A class containing helper functions which are used throughout the application.
    Item
    Primitive Item object.
    ItemArrayAdapter
    Specifies how to display an Item in the ListView.
    ItemList
    The list of items for the user automatically synchronized using a DatabaseManager.
    MainActivity
    The MainActivity is effectively the "main screen" which launches various dialogues and other activities based on user input.
    SignInActivity
    The initial activity where the user must login using their Google account to launch the MainActivity.
    SortFilterDialogFragment
    Hosts the SortFragment and FilterFragment.
    SortFragment
    Allows the user to adjust their UserPreferences FilterSettings.
    SortFragment.SortOrder
    Store settings for ascending or descending.
    SortFragment.SortType
    Store settings for sort type.
    SortSettings
    The SortSettings contain all of the settings data required to perform sorting on the item list.
    TagArrayAdapter
    Array adapter to display Tags.
    UserPreferences
    Stores user preferences for the whole user lifecycle.
    ViewItem_Fragment
    Displays a read-only view for the item from which the user can edit the item if they choose.
